modal.title: Merge Discussions
modal.ordering_date_help: Posts in the resulting discussion are reordered by their individual creation date
modal.ordering_suffix_label: Add merged posts to the end of the discussion
modal.ordering_suffix_help: Posts that are merged into the surviving discussion will be appended at the end of the discussion
modal.type_from_help_text: Choose target discussion to merge {title} into.

notification.discussion_merged: Your discussion {oldTitle} was merged into this discussion by {username}.

preferences.discussion_merged: Someone merges one of my discussions with another

post.merged: {count, plural, one {Merged # post from {titles}.} other {Merged # posts from {titles}.}}

settings.search_result_help: How many discussions should be returned when searching within the `Merge Discussions` modal.

merged.body:
Hey {recipient_display_name},

Your discussion, {merged_discussion_title}, was merged into {discussion_title} by {actor_display_name}.

View it here {discussion_url} .
merged.subject: Your discussion "{merged_discussion_title}" was merged
